data.name: GroupBy Conference
data.description: Group By offers free online training by the community, for the community. Anyone can submit a session for GroupBy, and community votes on who presents! From Group By Azure to Group By Snowflake, you get to decide the content.

relatedRecords.name: NE RPC
relatedRecords.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!

relatedRecords.description: Generelle InformationenDer AWS Community Day - Germany ist eine technische AWS Konferenz, veranstaltet als eintägiges Onlineevent und wird von der AWS User Group Community in der DACH Region organisiert.
